thread.section_title: Champs Elysees Plaza Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely staff
thread.title_full: Lovely staff - Review of Champs Elysees Plaza Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: francophone1000
title: Lovely staff
text:
We stay at the hotel every year. We love the staff, they are always friendly and helpful, epecially the reception staff, Tony and the night porter Sharif.
The rooms and bathrooms are good size for a city location.
The location is very good and easy to get to museum and restaurants.
We are already look forward to our next visit.
